definition: Ipoh city in Malaysia, capital of Sultanate of Perak on Malayan peninsula
harmony/pleased
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
Ipoh city in Malaysia, capital of Sultanate of Perak on Malayan peninsula

sentences.english: It is about 30 minutes drive south from the state capital, Ipoh .
sentences.chinese: 這是約30分鐘車程，南，從國家資本金，怡保。

sentences.english: The Post and Telegraphs Department moved from Taiping to Ipoh in 1928.
sentences.chinese: 郵政和電報部從太平到怡保於1928年。

sentences.english: After breakfast, depart Langkawi and starts journey to return back Johor Bahru.
sentences.chinese: 早餐後離開浮羅交怡到前往怡保市。

sentences.english: After breakfast processed to Perak Tong Cave Temple at Ipoh.
sentences.chinese: 早餐後前往參觀怡保霹靂洞。

sentences.english: I think Ipoh have several Indian temple. Some of my teachers were Indians.
sentences.chinese: 怡保市有幾座印度寺廟，我的幾位老師是印度人。

sentences.english: Not wanting to get caught, they drove to Ipoh for a hotel room.
sentences.chinese: 爲了不被抓到，他們開車到怡保找了個旅店。

sentences.english: A city of western Malaysia north-northwest of Kuala Lumpur.
sentences.chinese: 怡保馬來西亞西部城市，位於吉隆坡西北偏北面。
